Title: Remarks on Typhula sp. in Uzbekistan.
Keywords:
Central Asia, Rind cell pattern, Sclerotium, Snow mold,
Typhula variabilis
Abstract:
We examined three specimens of sclerotia from Tashkent
Province, Uzbekistan collected in April 1957. Sclerotium morphologies
and phylogenetic results suggested that the collected fungi were similar
to snow mold Typhula sp. in Iran. This record is new to Central
Asia.
